creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: coarse cotton waistband (4 1/4"); middle section blue batik print with tiny accordian pleats except center front and sides; pleats stitched in place; lower section in black with strong red horizontal applied tapes alternating with narrow white braid; lower section lined in blue cotton
title: Skirt
